Package com.rad.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.rad.entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block, Enemy, Item, Player
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
The base class of all entities to be added to the game world. Inherited by Block, Enemy, Item, Player.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Entity​(GameWorld gameWorld, int id, int x, int y)
    The constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
    Returns the bounds of the entity used for collision detection.

    Returns the location of the entity.

    Handles a collision with another entity.

    Used to initialize any fields for the entity specific to each certain subclass of entity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity​(GameWorld gameWorld, int id, int x, int y)
      The constructor. Calls the init() method.
      Parameters:
      id - the id that identifies what type of entity the entity is
      x - the x coordinate of the entity in pixels
      y - the y coordinate of the entity in pixels

  • Method Details

    • init

      public abstract void init()
      Used to initialize any fields for the entity specific to each certain subclass of entity.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Updates the entity's state. Called Const.FRAMES_PER_SECOND frames per second. Calls handleCollision(Entity e) if this entity is colliding with another entity.

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the game world to the screen. Called as often as possible. Draws the entity to the screen. The entity's sprite is determined by its ID; its position on the game world sprite sheet is calculated by the ID.
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics the images are drawn on.

    • handleCollision

      public void handleCollision​(Entity e)
      Handles a collision with another entity. To be overridden by subclasses.
      Parameters:
      e - the entity this entity collided with

    • getLocation

      public Location getLocation()
      Returns the location of the entity.
      Returns:
      the location of the entity.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Returns if the entity is dead
      Returns:
      if the entity is dead

    • getBounds

      public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
      Returns the bounds of the entity used for collision detection. The entity's velocity is added to the x and y to prevent the entities from being stuck.
      Returns:
      the bounds of the entity

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
